reviewText: Ordered this one twice now, and both times it arrived but would not play in any of my three DVD players in the house. "Formatting Error"  came up in every instance.  The DVD is advertised as created on demand, which leads me to believe that Pipin himself is burning this disc in his living room. Amazon, what gives? I live in California, and this DVD should have no problem being played. Amazon quickly replaced the first one, and I'm reluctant to try a third time when returning this 2nd one. Booo!
